thread.title: Ozil uncovered: Surprise anger in front of Wenger, team-mates’ frustration and popularity
thread.title_full: Ozil uncovered: Surprise anger in front of Wenger, team-mates’ frustration and popularity

title: Ozil uncovered: Surprise anger in front of Wenger, team-mates’ frustration and popularity
text: Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Ozil uncovered: Surprise anger in front of Wenger, team-mates’ frustration and popularity MESUT OZIL reportedly demonstrated his anger to Arsene Wenger by kicking a locker in the Arsenal dressing room. PUBLISHED: 22:04, Mon, Feb 13, 2017 | UPDATED: 22:40, Mon, Feb 13, 2017 The Gunners playmaker has cut a frustrated figure in recent months due to his and the team’s dip in form. Arsenal’s title bid is all but over and Mesut Ozil has struggled to have an influence on proceedings. In their last 10 Premier League matches, the Germany international has made eight appearances but failed to score and registered only two assists. One particular performance which annoyed Arsenal supporters was at Manchester City in December. GETTY Mesut Ozil has cut a frustrated figure in Arsenal's difficult spell of late Ozil is said to have booted a locker after the loss directly in front of Wenger Arsenal’s 2-1 defeat at the Etihad saw Ozil draw criticism, just days after he was blamed for Everton’s late winner against them. Wenger has admitted this week he feels the 28-year-old is lacking confidence in his technique and is reportedly considering dropping him for Wednesday’s crucial Champions League showdown away at Bayern Munich (7.45pm). According to The Independent , evidence of his frustration surfaced for the boss at City when Ozil is said to have booted a locker after the loss directly in front of Wenger. GETTY Mesut Ozil failed to make an impact in Arsenal's key game at Manchester City in December Arsenal player ratings against Manchester City Sun, December 18, 2016
